title: FF! Doc | CsvParserPipe
listItems: Required Support a current transaction; create a new one if none exists.
Supports Support a current transaction; execute non-transactionally if none exists.
Mandatory Support a current transaction; throw an exception if no current transaction exists.
RequiresNew Create a new transaction, suspending the current transaction if one exists.
NotSupported Do not support a current transaction; rather always execute non-transactionally.
Never Do not support a current transaction; throw an exception if a current transaction exists.

CrlPipe
CsvParserPipe
PipesTranslator
Reads a message in CSV format and turns it into XML.
See also
Github - CsvParserPipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.CsvParserPipe
Syntax
Copy
<CsvParserPipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
fileContainsHeader	boolean	true
Specifies if the first line should be treated as a header or as data.
fieldNames	text	-
Comma separated list of header names. If set, then fileContainsHeader defaults to false. If not set, headers are taken from the first line.
fieldSeparator	text	,
Character that separates fields.
headerCase	options	-
When set, character casing will be changed for the header.
Available Options: LOWERCASE, UPPERCASE
prettyPrint
